price: Wͻn mu nea ͻbefri N’akyi aka sε; “Me yε Nyame” no saa (nipa no) Yεde Amanehunu gya na ɛbɛtua ne so ka. Na saa na Yɛtua abͻneεfoͻ no so ka.
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman yaqul min'hum innī ilāhun min dūnihi fadhālika najzīhi jahannama kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
